skill.name: Armor
skill.description: Boosting defense and adding utility to equipped armor.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Movement and evasion

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Equipped light armor no longer weighs anything.
Also add STR attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Heavy armor no longer affects movement or athletic checks
Base skill mod is now 0. You can now perform the Hunker action.
perk.action_desc: Gain +2 AC until next turn.

perk.pk_desc: Gain +1 AC when wearing full set of armor.
Able to carry extra 10kg.
Gain +1 AC when wearing matching set of armor.
+1 to all saving throws involving or following physical damage. For example, damage amounts or status effects.

skill.name: Assault Weapons
skill.description: High damage output possibility, but is limited by range and accuracy.

expertise_1.ex_focus: More attacks but still hindered by spray roll

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Attacks per turn increases by 2 when using assault weapons.
Also add WIS attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
After rolling spray dice, you may choose to keep same result for any following rolls or roll again.
Base skill mod is now 0.
Attacks per turn increases by 1 when using assault weapons.
Damage die is now d6. Can now use assault rifles.
All assault weapon magazine size increases by 2.
Damage die is now d8. Can now use chain guns.

skill.name: Astrobiology
skill.description: The study of alien plants and animals.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Growing plants and extracting compounds from them.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Snaring Vines action.
perk.action_desc: At your current location, you lay down snaring vine starters. The next character (hostile or friendly) to step on that location will be snared by vines. Each turn, they are unable to move until they succeed a Str saving throw of 10 plus your skill mod.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CHA attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Companion Creature action.
perk.action_desc: Roll against nearby, non-hostile creature's Wis. On a success, creature will follow player until dismissed. Creature may or may not engage in combat.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Identify action.
perk.action_desc: Roll to try and glean information about nearby creatures or plant species. 0-10 = No pertinent info, 10-16 = Some info, 16+ = Very useful knowledge.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Healing Herbs action.
perk.action_desc: May use healing herbs in inventory to heal a party member for 1d6 plus skill modifier HP.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill proficiency is now 1.
Gain access to the Calm Lifeform action.
perk.action_desc: Roll against nearby target's Int. On a success, they will cease to be aggressive towards party. Works on hostile creatures or plants.

perk.pk_desc: Healing herbs now heals for 2d6 plus skill mod.

skill.name: Athletics
skill.description: Running, jumping, climbing, lifting, etc.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Fast movement

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Enemies do not get an attack of opportunity when you move past or away from them.
Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Shove action.
perk.action_desc: An adjacent target makes a STR saving throw of 12+ your skill mod. On a failure, you may shove them prone to a space up to 6 feet away.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod is now 0.
Maximum carrying capacity increased by 10kg.
Base skill mod is now 1. Getting up only uses 5m of movement.
Your maximum HP increases by 4 per level instead of 2
Movement increased by 10.

skill.name: Blade
skill.description: Melee attacks with a blade weapon, and dealing bleed damage.

expertise_1.ex_focus: One-handed, quick movements, reading the opponent.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CHA attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
May attack twice. Can only add 1 stack of bleed damage per turn.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Sword and shield. Lower damage, higher survivability.

perk.pk_desc: Also add INT attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Shield Bash action.
perk.action_desc: If shield is equipped, may attack with it for 1d8 damage. Enemy must make a Con saving throw of 12 plus your skill mod, on faliure they are staggered for 1 turn.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod is now 0.
Gain access to the Sharpen action.
perk.action_desc: During a short rest, you may choose to use one hit dice to sharpen your blade, increasing its damage dice to the next level. If already at 2d6, you increase it to 3d6. Lasts for 1 day.

perk.pk_desc: Damage die is now a d6. Able to use short blades.
If an enemy misses a melee hit against you, you may roll against their DEX to counter-attack with a single damage die.
Damage die is now a d8. Able to use long blades.

skill.name: Blunt
skill.description: Melee attacks with a blunt weapon, and staggering enemies.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Heavy hitting and stunning.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Sweeping Blow action.
perk.action_desc: You swing your weapon in an arc in front of you. Roll to hit each enemy within 6 feet. Damage dealt on successful hits is cut in half, but you may still stagger each opponent.

perk.pk_desc: Also add INT attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Shield Bash action.
perk.action_desc: If shield is equipped, may attack with it for 1d8 damage. Enemy must make a Con saving throw of 12 plus your skill mod, on faliure they are staggered for 1 turn.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod is now 0.
Gain access to the Heavy Strike action.
perk.action_desc: Once per short rest, you may summon your energy for a huge strike against an enemy with -2 to hit. On a successful hit, you deal double damage and automatically stagger enemy.

perk.pk_desc: Damage die is now a d6. Able to use maces.
Base saving throw for Bash increased to 10.
Damage die is now a d8. Able to use warhammers.

skill.name: Energy
skill.description: Harnessing the power of fire and lightning.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Area of effect and duration damage.

perk.pk_desc: Also add STR attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Area of AOE attacks is doubled.
Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Bolt now deals 4d6 damage
Base skill mod is now 0.
perk.action_desc: You may pick a 3-foot sphere of space you can see within 30 feet to ignite. Fire may spread to other nearby objects. Can be used as an attack, target will take 1d4 burn damage per turn for 3 turns. Cannot stack.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Bolt action.
perk.action_desc: Fire a bolt of electricity that deals 2d6 damage.

perk.pk_desc: You take half damage from all heat sources.
Gain access to the Energize action.
perk.action_desc: You focus in place on absorbing heat or UV energy from a specific nearby source, including solar energy. Gain a stack of Energize. The next Energy-based action you take is enerigized, meaning damage or effectiveness is multiplied based on your current number of stacks. You may take an action to recharge a stimplant for up to the number of stacks you have. All stacks are used up on any use.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Discharge action.
perk.action_desc: You send a wave of energy in a 10 sphere around you dealing 1d6 damage per stack of Energize you have to anything in range.

skill.name: Espionage
skill.description: Being deceptive either through disguise or through sneaking.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Blending in and deceiving people.

perk.pk_desc: Also add WIS attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Disguise action.
perk.action_desc: You diguise yourself as a fictional character. Sentients that you interact must make a Cha saving throw of 12+ skill mod. On a failure, they don't recognize you and you may interact with them as if they met you for the first time.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Avoiding notice and gaining advantage in danger.

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
You may now enter sneak mode in combat, but you must be behind cover and you must pass the skill check.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Sneak action.
perk.action_desc: Roll against the highest passive perception of a group of lifeforms to attempt to not be noticed. Doesn't work if you've already been noticed. Lasts until you step into view or make a significant noise. You can also overhear hushed conversations up to 20 feet away. May grant bonus first attack.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Decay action.
perk.action_desc: You create a holographic image of yourself and program it to perform a specific action on repeat (e.g. walk, sit, say a single phrase, etc.). Will distract nearby intelligent lifeforms until something dirupts the believablility (e.g. being attacked, running into a wall, saying the same phrase over and over).

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod now 1.
You can now overhear hushed conversations up to 40 feet away.
Gain access to the Sneak Attack action.
perk.action_desc: While sneaking, you may perform a single sneak attack to a single target with either a gun or melee weapon. You gain advantage to hit and damage dealt is increased by 50%

skill.name: Explosives
skill.description: Big Badda Boom.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Lots of explosions, who cares about proximity?

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
May attack twice. If a target needs to make two Dex checks, they have disadvantage on the second. Not applicable to a rocket launcher.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Setting traps and more accurate explosions.

perk.pk_desc: Also add INT attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Remote Detonation action.
Base skill mod is now 0.
Gain access to the Trip Wire action.
perk.action_desc: You can use a single explosive ammo from your inventory as a trap, having it go off when anything gets within 2m of it. It will go unnoticed by hostiles unless they pass an Observation saving throw of 10 + your Espionage skill.

perk.pk_desc: Increase damage dice. Able to use grenade launcher.
You take half damage from all explosion sources.
Increase damage dice. Able to use rocket launcher.

skill.name: Fluids
skill.description: Manipulation of matter states, especially liquids.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Utilizing and attacking with liquids.

perk.pk_desc: Also add STR attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Displace woprks on a 6 foot radius sphere of fluid and deals 2d8 + mod damage.
Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Ice Shield action.
perk.action_desc: You can materialize a slab of ice 4 inches thick either as a holdable shield or as a wall that is 6 feet by 6 feet. The shield grants +2 to AC and the wall acts as cover. Both have 12 HP, and the shield is hit on any missed hit roll.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Hydrate action.
perk.action_desc: You can create a small jet of water originating from one of your hands out up to 10m. It does not cause damage, but can be used to douse fires, water plants, or refill water containers. Does not use a charge.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Displace Liquid action.
perk.action_desc: You can manipulate a 1m radius sphere of nearby liquid within 10m of your current position. This could be used to create an air-bubble or to bombard a target with a fluid. If used as an attack, you deal 1d8 + skill mod damage.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Freezing Touch action.
perk.action_desc: You touch an object to freeze it solid. For objects larger than 100 lbs, you must use a charge. In combat, target must make a Con saving throw of 12+ your modifier. On a fail, they are frozen. Each turn, they must make a Con saving throw to become unfrozen, but the saving throw threshold goes down by 2 each turn.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Fog action.
perk.action_desc: You cause atmospheric liquid to condense and create a fog that covers a cube 20m wide and long and 5m tall.

perk.pk_desc: May use a charge to have Hydrate deal 2d6 + mod damage

skill.name: Gravity
skill.description: Changing gravitational forces on self or others.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Moving objects or other lifeforms.

perk.pk_desc: Also add STR attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Stasis Field action.
perk.action_desc: Target rolls STR saving throw of 12+ skill mod. On a failure, they are lifted into the air in a stasis field. They cannot move for two turns, and all attacks have advantage to hit against them.

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Levitate Self is replaced with the Flight action.
perk.action_desc: On a single charge, you gain 5 minutes of flight. Your movement in combat is not lowered when flying. Be aware, you may take cold or hypoxic damage if you fly too high.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Move Object action.
perk.action_desc: You can levitate and move an object weighing under 20kg to a location of your choice. If used as an attack, you use a charge and can deal 1d8 plus mod damage.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Levitate Self action.
perk.action_desc: You levitate yourself up to 1m off the ground. Your movement is limited to 0.5m per turn. Ends after 5 minutes or if you use another Gravity skill.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Slow Momentum action.
perk.action_desc: Able to slow down the movement of an object/creature weighing under 150kg by 5m per turn. If a creature is brought to a full stop, it must make a STR saving throw of 10+ your mod to try and break your control.

perk.pk_desc: Move Object now works on objects up to 50 kg, and it deals 2d8 damage as an attack. Also, Slow Momentum works on objects up to 250kg.
Gain access to the Deflect action.

skill.name: Long Range
skill.description: Attacking from a distance, and taking advantage of critical hits.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Low mobility, but improved crits.

perk.pk_desc: Also add WIS attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Crit requirement lowered by 3. Gain access to the Bullseye action.
perk.action_desc: If using a tripod rifle, you may decide to target a specific body part. On a hit, you deal standard damage (there is no crit bonus) and can disable the targetted body part.

expertise_2.ex_focus: More mobility, but lower emphasis on crits.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CHA attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Can now use a non-tripod long range rifle like any other gun out of cover.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Focused Breathing action.
perk.action_desc: You can forfeit your movement for this turn to center yourself and gain an extra +4 to hit on an attack.

perk.pk_desc: Critical hit requirement lowered by 2.
Increase damage dice. Able to use sniper rifle.
If attacking an enemy who doesn't notice you, any hit is a critical hit but a miss gives them advantage to next attack.
Increase damage dice. Able to use tripod rifle.

skill.name: Negotiation
skill.description: Interactions with intelligent lifeforms.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Lying and selling items at a higher price

perk.pk_desc: Also add INT attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
If you're trying to negotiate through a falsehood, you gain advantage.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Persuading and buying items at a lower price.

perk.pk_desc: Also add WIS attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
If you're trying to negotiate through a telling the truth, you gain advantage.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Coax action.
perk.action_desc: Once per person per day, you can decide to gain an advantage on a negotiation roll.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Haggle action.
perk.action_desc: Roll plus skill mod against a character's Cha. On a success, you can either buy an item at -20% the offer or sell for +20% the offer.

perk.pk_desc: Skill proficiency +1
Gain access to the Calm Sentient action.
perk.action_desc: Roll against nearby target's INT. On a success, they will cease to be aggressive towards party. Works on a single sentient target whose language you speak.

perk.pk_desc: Skill proficiency +1. No longer at disadvantage for skill checks where you don't speak the language.

skill.name: Observation
skill.description: Gleaning information from your situation and surroundings.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Picking up the bigger picture in conversations or situations.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CHA attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Gain access to the Empathize action.
perk.action_desc: You gain insight into an intelligent lifeform's motivations, giving you advantage on any non-combat rolls related to interactions with that lifeform.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Noticing the little details all around.

perk.pk_desc: Also add WIS attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
If an enemy gains a bonus round because of a sneak attack, you also get to join the bonus round with standard initiative order.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Investigate action.
perk.action_desc: Roll plus skill mod to investigate your surroundings. Depending on the result, the GM will give you information regarding the subject of your investigation. A failed roll, though might put you at a disadvantage.

perk.pk_desc: You collect more money and items from fallen enemies
Skill proficiency +1
Gain access to the Thinking Ahead action.
perk.action_desc: Roll plus skill mod to think about future possibilities based on a specific or hypothetical lifeform. Depending on the result the GM will give you insight into what could happen in the future in the format of "If I were….then I would….". Example: "If I were the guard of this building, I wouldn't be too suspicious of the elevator running."

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Weak Spot action.
perk.action_desc: Roll plus skill mod to gain insight into a target's possible weakness. On a 0-10, you gain no knowledge. On a 10-15, you choose which piece of information to gain: current HP, elemental weakness, or weak spot. On a 16+, you also gain advantage on next three attacks against that and similar targets. Can only be done once per type of target per day.

skill.name: Pistol
skill.description: Short range, highly mobile firearms.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Fast attacks that anticipate the opponent's moves.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CHA attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Quickdraw now shoots two shots and may crit. Base skill mod is now 2.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Twice the shooting, but a bit more vulnerable.

perk.pk_desc: Also add INT attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Quickdraw can now be used with two pistols on up to two targets. No damage or hit reduction from dual-wielding.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Quickdraw action.
perk.action_desc: If only using one pistol, you may roll against a target's passive perception to try and get a bonus attack at the start of an encounter. You still roll to hit with a single damage die and cannot crit. This is negated if an enemy gets in a surprise attack.

perk.pk_desc: May have one pistol equipped without raising suspicion.
Increase damage dice. Can use bolt pistol.
Attacks per turn increased by 1 when using pistols.
Increase damage dice. Can use heavy pistol.

skill.name: Psyche
skill.description: Manipulation of mind and body.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Forcing people to do what you want or hamper their minds and bodies.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CHA attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
For a charge, you can include this skill mod for any negotiation checks for 1 hour.
Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Add two more d6 dice for use with Renewal, and 2d6 healing to Homeostasis.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Center Yourself action.
perk.action_desc: As a minor action or non-combat action, you can use a charge to gain control over your mind and body to focus on your next task. You gain advantage on your next non-damage roll. Uses a charge.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Renewal action.
perk.action_desc: You lay a hand on a single target. They are healed for 1d6 plus your skill mod for each charge you decide to use.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Zone Out action.
perk.action_desc: A target of your choice must make an Wis saving throw of 12+ your skill mod. On a failure, they have a lapse in memory of the past 5 minutes, forgetting conversations and events from that time period. In combat, this will give target disadvantage on anything other than a hit roll.

perk.pk_desc: Renewal now heals 2d6 HP on one target or 1d6 to two adjascent targets.
Gain access to the Homeostasis action.
perk.action_desc: You lay your hand on a single target to remove any status effects plagueing them.

skill.name: Tech
skill.description: Working with current or ancient technology, or building your own.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Working with computers and other electronic devices.

perk.pk_desc: Also add WIS attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Ctrl + F is replaced by the Hack action.
perk.action_desc: Roll plus skill mod to take control of a local device or any other devices connected to its server. You can get any information on the server and will not be noticed by any non-AI. You may be able to control non-AI robots, but they get to roll an INT saving throw of 12+ your skill mod.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Building new objects or repairing damaged ones.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Can now create advanced mods with proper components and basic mods with spare parts.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Ctrl + F action.
perk.action_desc: Roll plus skill mod to glean information from an electronic source. Depending on the result, the GM will give you information regarding the subject of your investigation. A failed roll, though might put you at a disadvantage.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Patch Up action.
perk.action_desc: Using spare parts, you can repair weapons by 25% and some broken items.

perk.pk_desc: Base skill mod now 1. No longer at disadvantage handling unknown tech
Can now create simple mods with proper components.
Gain access to the Drone Scout action.
perk.action_desc: You send out a small drone up to 300 feet away to give you simple visuals as it moves along. If it is noticed, it will be attacked and all enemies will have +2 to passive perception from then on. When attacked, it has an AC of 8 and 1 HP.

skill.name: Unarmed
skill.description: Using bare hands to deal damage and control the battle.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Giving and taking blows.

perk.pk_desc: Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
Add another attack. Any successful hit rolls may be transferred to any subsequent attacks.

expertise_2.ex_focus: Dodging, disarming, and causing status effects.

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
If wearing no armor, your AC turns into evasion, which is Dex plus your skill mod. If you already have evasion, add this skill modifier to your evasion rating.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Shock Absorption action.
perk.action_desc: When taking melee damage, roll + skill mod against enemy's STR. If successful, you only take half damage.

perk.pk_desc: Attacks per turn increased by 1.
Increase damage dice. Can use brass knuckles.
Gain access to the Sweeping Kick action.
perk.action_desc: Roll to hit and deal 1d6 damage plus skill mod. Enemy makes a Dex saving throw of 12+ your skill mod. On a failure, they are knocked prone giving you advantage against them until they stand up and forcing an attack of opportunity when they stand.

perk.pk_desc: Increase damage dice. Can use power gauntlet.

skill.name: Vehicles
skill.description: Controlling all types of vehicles.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Operating gravity-affected vehicles.

perk.pk_desc: Also add STR attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
You gain advantage to vehicle checks involving known planet-bound vehicles.
Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
You gain advantage to vehicle checks involving known space vehicles.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Swerve action.
perk.action_desc: On a failed vehicles check, you may try the check again to regain control, but with -2 to the final result.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Grease Monkey action.
perk.action_desc: You can repair vehicles that have more than 50% HP without having to use spare parts for 2d8 HP.

perk.pk_desc: Skill proficiency +1. No longer at a disadvantage handling unknown vehicles.
Gain access to the Ramming Speed action.
perk.action_desc: May use all vehicle movement and major action to ram and deal damage to enemies or obstacles. Enemies not in vehicles roll a dex saving throw of 12+ skill mod, on a failure, you deal 4d6 damage. On a success, you deal no damage, but they must move 2 spaces away. For obstacles, including other vehicles, you roll a saving throw of 18 - skill mod. On a success, roll 3d6. You deal that much damage to your vehicle and twice that amount to the obstacle. On a failure, damage is equal.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Evasive Maneuver action.
perk.action_desc: All enemies must roll a dex saving throw of 12+ skill mod. On a failure, they are at a disadvantage for every hit roll against you for three turns. If they are in a vehicle, you gain advantage to hitting them for three turns.

skill.name: Wave
skill.description: Controlling light and sound waves.

expertise_1.ex_focus: Creating visual illusions and changing light levels.

perk.pk_desc: Also add DEX attribute modifier to your skill modifier.
You can dim the amount of light in a 100-foot radius to any level except absolute darkness for up to 10 minutes.
Also add CON attribute modifier to your skill modifier.

You fill a targets ears with a painful ringing, causing 1d6 mental damage. They must make a con saving throw of 12+ skill mod each turn to try and overcome it. On a failure, they are at disadvantage for hitting targets and making saving throws. On a success, the tinnitus passes and they return to normal.
Base skill mod is now 0. Gain access to the Illuminate action.
perk.action_desc: An orb of light appears in your hands and illuminates in a 30-foot sphere. You may either keep the light indefinitely a hand used up, or you may cast the light in a single direction. When cast, it will dissipate when it hits an object. Does not use a charge.

perk.pk_desc: Gain access to the Throw Voice action.
perk.action_desc: You can make your voice come from a location up to 100 feet away for up to 5 minutes.

perk.pk_desc: You now have full vision in dim light. Muhmin have full vision in any lighting except absolute darkness.
Gain access to the Refract action.
Gain access to the Harmonic Frequency action.
perk.action_desc: You place a hand on the ground and radiate the grounds harmonic frequency causing the ground to shake. Everything in a 30-foot radius must make a Con saving throw of 10+. On a failure, they are knocked prone.
